theming.title: Theming
theming.descGlyphs: SVG Icon Glyphs built using IcoMooon App

core.title: Core Elements
core.description: Core viewport and page components for building applications
core.descPages: Page components for creating various page layouts
core.descGrid: Responsive layout for various display viewports

inputs.title: Input Elements
inputs.description: Comprehensive input elements for business related forms
inputs.descButtons: Basic buttons with groups and dropdowns
inputs.descText: Basic inputs for text, numbers and phone numbers
inputs.descLists: Common list, combo and tag inputs, with search capability
inputs.descMd: Content editors for multi-language and markdown content

comps.title: UI Components
comps.descMenus: Menu components for creating menu lists and menubars
comps.descToolbar: Simple toolbar for dialogs and panels
comps.descPanels: Create panels with optional collapsible and closable
comps.descDialogs: Create panels with optional collapsible and closable
comps.descAlerts: Alert dialogs and floating toast messages
comps.descCrumbs: Themed breadcrumbs for navigating through various levels
comps.descTree: Tree styled data display with optional checkable nodes
comps.descGrid: Functional datagrid with resizable columns and summary row.

apis.title: API Classes
apis.descApp: Application singleton for common functionality shared across entire app
apis.descData: Generic data model for serializing/deserializing pojo data
apis.descEvent: Helper class for event broadcast, subscribe and task queues
